greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square root of the prime factor form (A276086) of the primorial base expansion, computed for such numbers for which it is a square.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..9072
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
mathematica: With[{b = MixedRadix[Reverse@ Prime@ Range@ 20]}, Select[Array[Sqrt@ Function[k, Times @@ Power @@@ # &@ Transpose@ {Prime@ Range@ Length@ k, Reverse@ k}]@ IntegerDigits[#, b] &, 10^3, 0], IntegerQ]] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Oct 30 2019 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 30 2019
